channel.title: react-native on AngryNerd.in

item.title: Supercharging your React Native development workflow
item.description: Shake that! Opening up the developer menu in mobile during react native development is no easy feat. Much like what Will Smith had to do, except much more tedious is the gesture “Shake that”. One of my team members gave the idea of sending the development option command through adb — and as expected running adb shell input keyevent 82 in terminal quickly opens the development menu and reloading the app becomes an easier job.
